mods.abstract: Bryan family at home with Betty and Charles Jr in yard and playing with accordion at Falconhurst in McMinnville, Tenn., exiting home in Cookeville, Tenn. (unconfirmed) (2:01), Falconhurst with the Bryan family (2:05), Black women hanging laundry in yard at Falconhurst (3:12), White women in cap and gown outside of Cookeville home (3:20), in-laws arriving at home (3:42), unknown locations (4:02), eating watermelon outside with family (4:27), family outside of house looking at yard and barn (5:52), driving in car and looking at corn field (7:17), driving and passing horse drawn vehicles (7:15), arriving at family's home with Charles Jr. and Betty (7:54), Charles on a fiddle and accordion (9:50), outside of home at Cherry Street, Cookeville, Tenn. (unconfirmed) (10:38), Charles catching chickens at Falconhurst (10:59), exiting academic building at Tennessee Polytechnic Institute and the quad (11:19), Edith eating snow from yard and making snowballs (11:54), Edith in yard modeling outfits (13:19), Bryan family exiting home (13:52), infant looking at swan (14:20).

titleInfo.title: RG 42 Charles Faulkner Bryan papers, reel film.
